1: וַאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> אַחַ֔ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>Also I in the first</n> לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <sup>1867 </sup> <n>of Darius</n> הַמָּדִ֑י <sup>4075 </sup> <n>the Mede</n> עָמְדִ֛י <sup>5975 </sup> <n>arose</n> לְמַחֲזִ֥יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>to confirm</n> וּלְמָע֖וֹז <sup>4581 </sup> <n>and to strengthen</n> לֽוֹ׃
2: וְעַתָּ֕ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> אֱמֶ֖ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>thee the truth</n> אַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>And now will I shew</n> לָ֑ךְ הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עוֹד֩ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>more</n> שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <sup>7969 </sup> <n>yet three</n> מְלָכִ֜ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>kings</n> עֹמְדִ֣ים <sup>5975 </sup> <n>Behold there shall stand up</n> לְפָרַ֗ס <sup>6539 </sup> <n>in Persia</n> וְהָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <sup>7243 </sup> <n>and the fourth</n> יַעֲשִׁ֤יר <sup>6238 </sup> <n>richer</n> עֹֽשֶׁר־ <sup>6239 </sup> <n>shall be far</n> גָּדוֹל֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>than [they] all</n> מִכֹּ֔ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> וּכְחֶזְקָת֣וֹ <sup>2393 </sup> <n>and by his strength</n> בְעָשְׁר֔וֹ <sup>6239 </sup> <n>through his riches</n> יָעִ֣יר <sup>5782 </sup> <n>he shall stir up</n> הַכֹּ֔ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>the whole</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> מַלְכ֥וּת <sup>4438 </sup> <n>all against the realm</n> יָוָֽן׃ <sup>3120 </sup> <n>of Grecia</n>
3: וְעָמַ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall stand up</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> גִּבּ֑וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>And a mighty</n> וּמָשַׁל֙ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>that shall rule</n> מִמְשָׁ֣ל <sup>4474 </sup> <n>dominion</n> רַ֔ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>with great</n> וְעָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> כִּרְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>according to his will</n>
4: וּכְעָמְדוֹ֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>And when he shall stand up</n> תִּשָּׁבֵ֣ר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall be broken</n> מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <sup>4438 </sup> <n>his kingdom</n> וְתֵחָ֕ץ <sup>2673 </sup> <n>and shall be divided</n> לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>toward the four</n> רוּח֣וֹת <sup>7307 </sup> <n>winds</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of heaven</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> לְאַחֲרִית֗וֹ <sup>319 </sup> <n>and not to his posterity</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> כְמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <sup>4915 </sup> <n>nor according to his dominion</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מָשָׁ֔ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>which he ruled</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תִנָּתֵשׁ֙ <sup>5428 </sup> <n>shall be plucked up</n> מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <sup>4438 </sup> <n>for his kingdom</n> וְלַאֲחֵרִ֖ים <sup>312 </sup> <n>even for others</n> מִלְּבַד־ <sup>905 </sup> <n>alone</n> אֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>another</n>
5: וְיֶחֱזַ֥ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>shall be strong</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> הַנֶּ֖גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> שָׂרָ֑יו <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and [one] of his princes</n> וְיֶחֱזַ֤ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and he shall be strong</n> עָלָיו֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> וּמָשָׁ֔ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>above him and have dominion</n> מִמְשָׁ֥ל <sup>4474 </sup> <n>dominion</n> רַ֖ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[shall be] a great</n> מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>4475 </sup> <n>his dominion</n>
6: וּלְקֵ֤ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>And in the end</n> שָׁנִים֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>of years</n> יִתְחַבָּ֔רוּ <sup>2266 </sup> <n>they shall join themselves together</n> וּבַ֣ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughter</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>for the king's</n> הַנֶּ֗גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> תָּבוֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> הַצָּפ֔וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to make</n> מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <sup>4339 </sup> <n>an agreement</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תַעְצֹ֞ר <sup>6113 </sup> <n>but she shall not retain</n> כּ֣וֹחַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>the power</n> הַזְּר֗וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>of the arm</n> וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יַעֲמֹד֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>neither shall he stand</n> וּזְרֹע֔וֹ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>nor his arm</n> וְתִנָּתֵ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>but she shall be given up</n> הִ֤יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>who</n> וּמְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they that brought</n> וְהַיֹּ֣לְדָ֔הּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>her and he that begat</n> וּמַחֲזִקָ֖הּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>her and he that strengthened</n> בָּעִתִּֽים׃ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>her in [these] times</n>
7: וְעָמַ֛ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall [one] stand up</n> מִנֵּ֥צֶר <sup>5342 </sup> <n>But out of a branch</n> שָׁרָשֶׁ֖יהָ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>of her roots</n> כַּנּ֑וֹ <sup>3653 </sup> <n>in his estate</n> וְיָבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>which shall come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> הַחַ֗יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>with an army</n> וְיָבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and shall enter</n> בְּמָעוֹז֙ <sup>4581 </sup> <n>into the fortress</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n> הַצָּפ֔וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> וְעָשָׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and shall deal</n> בָהֶ֖ם וְהֶחֱזִֽיק׃ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>against them and shall prevail</n>
8: וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Also</n> אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵיהֶ֡ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their gods</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> נְסִֽכֵיהֶם֩ <sup>5257 </sup> <n>with their princes</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כְּלֵ֨י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>vessels</n> חֶמְדָּתָ֜ם <sup>2532 </sup> <n>[and] with their precious</n> כֶּ֧סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> וְזָהָ֛ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and of gold</n> בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>captives</n> יָבִ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And shall also carry</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>into Egypt</n> וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>his part</n> שָׁנִ֣ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>[more] years</n> יַעֲמֹ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and he shall continue</n> מִמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>than the king</n> הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n>
9: וּבָ֗א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> בְּמַלְכוּת֙ <sup>4438 </sup> <n>into [his] kingdom</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>So the king</n> הַנֶּ֔גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> וְשָׁ֖ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and shall return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>127 </sup> <n>into his own land</n>
10: [וּבְנֹו כ] (וּבָנָ֣יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> ק) יִתְגָּר֗וּ <sup>1624 </sup> <n>shall be stirred up</n> וְאָסְפוּ֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and shall assemble</n> הֲמוֹן֙ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>a multitude</n> חֲיָלִ֣ים <sup>2428 </sup> <n>forces</n> רַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of great</n> וּבָ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and [one] shall certainly</n> ב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> וְשָׁטַ֣ף <sup>7857 </sup> <n>and overflow</n> וְעָבָ֑ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and pass through</n> וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>then shall he return</n> [וְיִתְגָּרוּ כ] (וְיִתְגָּרֶ֖ה <sup>1624 </sup> <n>will mobilize</n> ק) עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> [מָעֻזָּה כ] (מָעֻזֹּֽו׃ <sup>4581 </sup> <n>force</n> ק)
11: וְיִתְמַרְמַר֙ <sup>4843 </sup> <n>shall be moved with choler</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> הַנֶּ֔גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> וְיָצָ֕א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and shall come forth</n> וְנִלְחַ֥ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and fight</n> עִמּ֖וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>with him [even] with the king</n> הַצָּפ֑וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and he shall set forth</n> הָמ֣וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>multitude</n> רָ֔ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>a great</n> וְנִתַּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall be given</n> הֶהָמ֖וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>but the multitude</n> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into his hand</n>
12: וְנִשָּׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>[And] when he hath taken away</n> הֶהָמ֖וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>the multitude</n> [יָרוּם כ] (וְרָ֣ם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>bring up</n> ק) לְבָב֑וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>his heart</n> וְהִפִּ֛יל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and he shall cast down</n> רִבֹּא֖וֹת <sup>7239 </sup> <n>[many] ten thousands</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he will not</n> יָעֽוֹז׃ <sup>5810 </sup> <n>but he shall not be strengthened</n>
13: וְשָׁב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>For the king</n> הַצָּפ֔וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> וְהֶעֱמִ֣יד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and shall set forth</n> הָמ֔וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>a multitude</n> רַ֖ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>greater</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <sup>7223 </sup> <n>than the former</n> וּלְקֵ֨ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>after</n> הָֽעִתִּ֤ים <sup>6256 </sup> <n>certain</n> שָׁנִים֙ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> יָ֣בוֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and shall certainly</n> ב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> בְּחַ֥יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>army</n> גָּד֖וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a great</n> וּבִרְכ֥וּשׁ <sup>7399 </sup> <n>riches</n> רָֽב׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and with much</n>
14: וּבָעִתִּ֣ים <sup>6256 </sup> <n>And in those times</n> הָהֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> רַבִּ֥ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>there shall many</n> יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stand up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>against the king</n> הַנֶּ֑גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> וּבְנֵ֣י ׀ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> פָּרִיצֵ֣י <sup>6530 </sup> <n>the violent</n> עַמְּךָ֗ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> יִֽנַּשְּׂא֛וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall exalt</n> לְהַעֲמִ֥יד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>themselves to establish</n> חָז֖וֹן <sup>2377 </sup> <n>the vision</n> וְנִכְשָֽׁלוּ׃ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>but they shall fall</n>
15: וְיָבֹא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>So the king</n> הַצָּפ֔וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> וְיִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>and cast up</n> סֽוֹלֲלָ֔ה <sup>5550 </sup> <n>a mount</n> וְלָכַ֖ד <sup>3920 </sup> <n>and take</n> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> מִבְצָר֑וֹת <sup>4013 </sup> <n>the most fenced</n> וּזְרֹע֤וֹת <sup>2220 </sup> <n>and the arms</n> הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall not withstand</n> וְעַם֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> מִבְחָרָ֔יו <sup>4005 </sup> <n>neither his chosen</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> כֹּ֖חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>neither [shall there be any] strength</n> לַעֲמֹֽד׃ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>to withstand</n>
16: וְיַ֨עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>against him shall do</n> הַבָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>But he that cometh</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> כִּרְצוֹנ֔וֹ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>according to his own will</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and no</n> עוֹמֵ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and none shall stand</n> לְפָנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְיַעֲמֹ֥ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>him and he shall stand</n> בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַצְּבִ֖י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>in the glorious</n> וְכָלָ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>accomplish</n> בְיָדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>which by his hand</n>
17: וְיָשֵׂ֣ם ׀ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>He shall also set</n> פָּ֠נָיו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> לָב֞וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to enter</n> בְּתֹ֧קֶף <sup>8633 </sup> <n>with the strength</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of his whole</n> מַלְכוּת֛וֹ <sup>4438 </sup> <n>of his whole kingdom</n> וִישָׁרִ֥ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and upright ones</n> עִמּ֖וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וְעָשָׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>with him thus shall he do</n> וּבַ֤ת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>him the daughter</n> הַנָּשִׁים֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>of women</n> יִתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he shall give</n> ל֣וֹ לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֔הּ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>corrupting</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>she will not</n> תַעֲמֹ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>her but she shall not stand</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ל֥וֹ תִהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
18: [וְיָשֵׁב כ] (וְיָשֵׂ֧ם <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will turn</n> ק) פָּנָ֛יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> לְאִיִּ֖ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>unto the isles</n> וְלָכַ֣ד <sup>3920 </sup> <n>and shall take</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> וְהִשְׁבִּ֨ית <sup>7673 </sup> <n>offered by him to cease</n> קָצִ֤ין <sup>7101 </sup> <n>but a prince</n> חֶרְפָּתוֹ֙ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>for his own behalf shall cause the reproach</n> ל֔וֹ בִּלְתִּ֥י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>without</n> חֶרְפָּת֖וֹ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>his own reproach</n> יָשִׁ֥יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>he shall cause [it] to turn</n> לֽוֹ׃
19: וְיָשֵׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Then he shall turn</n> פָּנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> לְמָעוּזֵּ֖י <sup>4581 </sup> <n>toward the fort</n> אַרְצ֑וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of his own land</n> וְנִכְשַׁ֥ל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>but he shall stumble</n> וְנָפַ֖ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and fall</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יִמָּצֵֽא׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and not be found</n>
20: וְעָמַ֧ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>Then shall stand up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> כַּנּ֛וֹ <sup>3653 </sup> <n>in his estate</n> מַעֲבִ֥יר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>a raiser</n> נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>of taxes</n> הֶ֣דֶר <sup>1925 </sup> <n>[in] the glory</n> מַלְכ֑וּת <sup>4438 </sup> <n>of the kingdom</n> וּבְיָמִ֤ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> אֲחָדִים֙ <sup>259 </sup> <n>but within few</n> יִשָּׁבֵ֔ר <sup>7665 </sup> <n>he shall be destroyed</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> בְאַפַּ֖יִם <sup>639 </sup> <n>neither in anger</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> בְמִלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>nor in battle</n>
21: וְעָמַ֤ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall stand up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>In</n> כַּנּוֹ֙ <sup>3653 </sup> <n>And in his estate</n> נִבְזֶ֔ה <sup>959 </sup> <n>a vile person</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> נָתְנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>to whom they shall not give</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> ה֣וֹד <sup>1935 </sup> <n>the honour</n> מַלְכ֑וּת <sup>4438 </sup> <n>of the kingdom</n> וּבָ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>but he shall come</n> בְשַׁלְוָ֔ה <sup>7962 </sup> <n>in peaceably</n> וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and obtain</n> מַלְכ֖וּת <sup>4438 </sup> <n>the kingdom</n> בַּחֲלַקְלַקּֽוֹת׃ <sup>2519 </sup> <n>by flatteries</n>
22: וּזְרֹע֥וֹת <sup>2220 </sup> <n>And with the arms</n> הַשֶּׁ֛טֶף <sup>7858 </sup> <n>of a flood</n> יִשָּׁטְפ֥וּ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>shall they be overflown</n> מִלְּפָנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וְיִשָּׁבֵ֑רוּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>him and shall be broken</n> וְגַ֖ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and also</n> נְגִ֥יד <sup>5057 </sup> <n>yea also the prince</n> בְּרִֽית׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of the covenant</n>
23: וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>After</n> הִֽתְחַבְּר֥וּת <sup>2266 </sup> <n>And after the league</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>him</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[made] with him he shall work</n> מִרְמָ֑ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>deceitfully</n> וְעָלָ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>for he shall come up</n> וְעָצַ֖ם <sup>6105 </sup> <n>and shall become strong</n> בִּמְעַט־ <sup>4592 </sup> <n>with a small</n> גּֽוֹי׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>people</n>
24: בְּשַׁלְוָ֞ה <sup>7962 </sup> <n>peaceably</n> וּבְמִשְׁמַנֵּ֣י <sup>4924 </sup> <n>even upon the fattest places</n> מְדִינָה֮ <sup>4082 </sup> <n>of the province</n> יָבוֹא֒ <sup>935 </sup> <n>He shall enter</n> וְעָשָׂ֗ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and he shall do</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>never</n> עָשׂ֤וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have not done</n> אֲבֹתָיו֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>[that] which his fathers</n> וַאֲב֣וֹת <sup>1 </sup> <n>nor his fathers'</n> אֲבֹתָ֔יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>fathers</n> בִּזָּ֧ה <sup>961 </sup> <n>among them the prey</n> וְשָׁלָ֛ל <sup>7998 </sup> <n>and spoil</n> וּרְכ֖וּשׁ <sup>7399 </sup> <n>and riches</n> לָהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> יִבְז֑וֹר <sup>967 </sup> <n>he shall scatter</n> וְעַ֧ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> מִבְצָרִ֛ים <sup>4013 </sup> <n>against the strong holds</n> יְחַשֵּׁ֥ב <sup>2803 </sup> <n>[yea] and he shall forecast</n> מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֖יו <sup>4284 </sup> <n>his devices</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>but for</n> עֵֽת׃ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>even for a time</n>
25: וְיָעֵר֩ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>And he shall stir up</n> כֹּח֨וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>his power</n> וּלְבָב֜וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and his courage</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>against the king</n> הַנֶּגֶב֮ <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> בְּחַ֣יִל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>army</n> גָּדוֹל֒ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a great</n> וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and the king</n> הַנֶּ֗גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> יִתְגָּרֶה֙ <sup>1624 </sup> <n>shall be stirred up</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> בְּחַֽיִל־ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>army</n> גָּד֥וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>great</n> וְעָצ֖וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>and mighty</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>with</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>with a very</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he will not</n> יַעֲמֹ֔ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>but he shall not stand</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יַחְשְׁב֥וּ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>for they shall forecast</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> מַחֲשָׁבֽוֹת׃ <sup>4284 </sup> <n>devices</n>
26: וְאֹכְלֵ֧י <sup>398 </sup> <n>Yea they that feed</n> פַת־ בָּג֛וֹ <sup>6598 </sup> <n>of the portion of his meat</n> יִשְׁבְּר֖וּהוּ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>shall destroy</n> וְחֵיל֣וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>him and his army</n> יִשְׁט֑וֹף <sup>7857 </sup> <n>shall overflow</n> וְנָפְל֖וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> חֲלָלִ֥ים <sup>2491 </sup> <n>down slain</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and many</n>
27: וּשְׁנֵיהֶ֤ם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>And both</n> הַמְּלָכִים֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>these kings'</n> לְבָבָ֣ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>hearts</n> לְמֵרָ֔ע <sup>4827 </sup> <n>do mischief</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שֻׁלְחָ֥ן <sup>7979 </sup> <n>table</n> אֶחָ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>at one</n> כָּזָ֣ב <sup>3577 </sup> <n>lies</n> יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and they shall speak</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>it will not</n> תִצְלָ֔ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>but it shall not prosper</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> קֵ֖ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>for yet the end</n> לַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>[shall be] at the time appointed</n>
28: וְיָשֹׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Then shall he return</n> אַרְצוֹ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>into his land</n> בִּרְכ֣וּשׁ <sup>7399 </sup> <n>riches</n> גָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with great</n> וּלְבָב֖וֹ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and his heart</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>will be against</n> בְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> קֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>[shall be] against the holy</n> וְעָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and he shall do</n> וְשָׁ֥ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[exploits] and return</n> לְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to his own land</n>
29: לַמּוֹעֵ֥ד <sup>4150 </sup> <n>At the time appointed</n> יָשׁ֖וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>he shall return</n> וּבָ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and come</n> בַנֶּ֑גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>toward the south</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>it will not</n> תִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>turn</n> כָרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>but it shall not be as the former</n> וְכָאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <sup>314 </sup> <n>or as the latter</n>
30: וּבָ֨אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> ב֜וֹ צִיִּ֤ים <sup>6716 </sup> <n>For the ships</n> כִּתִּים֙ <sup>3794 </sup> <n>of Chittim</n> וְנִכְאָ֔ה <sup>3512 </sup> <n>against him therefore he shall be grieved</n> וְשָׁ֛ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and return</n> וְזָעַ֥ם <sup>2194 </sup> <n>and have indignation</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בְּרִֽית־ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> ק֖וֹדֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>against the holy</n> וְעָשָׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>so shall he do</n> וְשָׁ֣ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>he shall even return</n> וְיָבֵ֔ן <sup>995 </sup> <n>and have intelligence</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עֹזְבֵ֖י <sup>5800 </sup> <n>with them that forsake</n> בְּרִ֥ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>the holy</n>
31: וּזְרֹעִ֖ים <sup>2220 </sup> <n>And arms</n> מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> יַעֲמֹ֑דוּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>shall stand</n> וְחִלְּל֞וּ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>on his part and they shall pollute</n> הַמִּקְדָּ֤שׁ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>the sanctuary</n> הַמָּעוֹז֙ <sup>4581 </sup> <n>of strength</n> וְהֵסִ֣ירוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and shall take away</n> הַתָּמִ֔יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>the daily</n> וְנָתְנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[sacrifice] and they shall place</n> הַשִּׁקּ֥וּץ <sup>8251 </sup> <n>the abomination</n> מְשׁוֹמֵֽם׃ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>that maketh desolate</n>
32: וּמַרְשִׁיעֵ֣י <sup>7561 </sup> <n>And such as do wickedly</n> בְרִ֔ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>against the covenant</n> יַחֲנִ֖יף <sup>2610 </sup> <n>shall he corrupt</n> בַּחֲלַקּ֑וֹת <sup>2514 </sup> <n>by flatteries</n> וְעַ֛ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>but the people</n> יֹדְעֵ֥י <sup>3045 </sup> <n>that do know</n> אֱלֹהָ֖יו <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> יַחֲזִ֥קוּ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>shall be strong</n> וְעָשֽׂוּ׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n>
33: וּמַשְׂכִּ֣ילֵי <sup>7919 </sup> <n>And they that understand</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n> יָבִ֖ינוּ <sup>995 </sup> <n>shall instruct</n> לָֽרַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> וְנִכְשְׁל֞וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>yet they shall fall</n> בְּחֶ֧רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> וּבְלֶהָבָ֛ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>and by flame</n> בִּשְׁבִ֥י <sup>7628 </sup> <n>by captivity</n> וּבְבִזָּ֖ה <sup>961 </sup> <n>and by spoil</n> יָמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[many] days</n>
34: וּבְהִכָּ֣שְׁלָ֔ם <sup>3782 </sup> <n>Now when they shall fall</n> יֵעָזְר֖וּ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>they shall be holpen</n> עֵ֣זֶר <sup>5828 </sup> <n>help</n> מְעָ֑ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>with a little</n> וְנִלְו֧וּ <sup>3867 </sup> <n>shall cleave</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רַבִּ֖ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>but many</n> בַּחֲלַקְלַקּֽוֹת׃ <sup>2519 </sup> <n>to them with flatteries</n>
35: וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>Some</n> הַמַּשְׂכִּילִ֣ים <sup>7919 </sup> <n>And [some] of them of understanding</n> יִכָּֽשְׁל֗וּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> לִצְר֥וֹף <sup>6884 </sup> <n>to try</n> בָּהֶ֛ם וּלְבָרֵ֥ר <sup>1305 </sup> <n>them and to purge</n> וְלַלְבֵּ֖ן <sup>3835 </sup> <n>and to make [them] white</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> עֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>[even] to the time</n> קֵ֑ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>of the end</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> ע֖וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> לַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <sup>4150 </sup> <n>because [it is] yet for a time appointed</n>
36: וְעָשָׂ֨ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall do</n> כִרְצוֹנ֜וֹ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>according to his will</n> הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> וְיִתְרוֹמֵ֤ם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>and he shall exalt</n> וְיִתְגַּדֵּל֙ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>himself and magnify</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> אֵ֔ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>himself above every god</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>against the God</n> אֵלִ֔ים <sup>410 </sup> <n>of gods</n> יְדַבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and shall speak</n> נִפְלָא֑וֹת <sup>6381 </sup> <n>marvellous things</n> וְהִצְלִ֙יחַ֙ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and shall prosper</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כָּ֣לָה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>be accomplished</n> זַ֔עַם <sup>2195 </sup> <n>till the indignation</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>which</n> נֶחֱרָצָ֖ה <sup>2782 </sup> <n>for that that is determined</n> נֶעֱשָֽׂתָה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall be done</n>
37: וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> אֲבֹתָיו֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his fathers</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָבִ֔ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>Neither shall he regard</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> חֶמְדַּ֥ת <sup>2532 </sup> <n>nor the desire</n> נָשִׁ֛ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>of women</n> וְעַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> אֱל֖וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>any god</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יָבִ֑ין <sup>995 </sup> <n>nor regard</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִתְגַּדָּֽל׃ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>for he shall magnify</n>
38: וְלֶאֱלֹ֙הַּ֙ <sup>433 </sup> <n>the God</n> מָֽעֻזִּ֔ים <sup>4581 </sup> <n>of forces</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> כַּנּ֖וֹ <sup>3653 </sup> <n>But in his estate</n> יְכַבֵּ֑ד <sup>3513 </sup> <n>shall he honour</n> וְלֶאֱל֜וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>and a god</n> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יְדָעֻ֣הוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>knew</n> אֲבֹתָ֗יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>whom his fathers</n> יְכַבֵּ֛ד <sup>3513 </sup> <n>not shall he honour</n> בְּזָהָ֥ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>with gold</n> וּבְכֶ֛סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and silver</n> וּבְאֶ֥בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> יְקָרָ֖ה <sup>3368 </sup> <n>and with precious</n> וּבַחֲמֻדֽוֹת׃ <sup>2530 </sup> <n>beauty</n>
39: וְעָשָׂ֞ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Thus shall he do</n> לְמִבְצְרֵ֤י <sup>4013 </sup> <n>holds</n> מָֽעֻזִּים֙ <sup>4581 </sup> <n>in the most strong</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֱל֣וֹהַּ <sup>433 </sup> <n>god</n> נֵכָ֔ר <sup>5236 </sup> <n>with a strange</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> [הִכִּיר כ] (יַכִּ֖יר <sup>5234 </sup> <n>acknowledge</n> ק) יַרְבֶּ֣ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>[and] increase</n> כָב֑וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>with glory</n> וְהִמְשִׁילָם֙ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>and he shall cause them to rule</n> בָּֽרַבִּ֔ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>over many</n> וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>the land</n> יְחַלֵּ֥ק <sup>2505 </sup> <n>and shall divide</n> בִּמְחִֽיר׃ <sup>4242 </sup> <n>for gain</n>
40: וּבְעֵ֣ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>And at the time</n> קֵ֗ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>of the end</n> יִתְנַגַּ֤ח <sup>5055 </sup> <n>push</n> עִמּוֹ֙ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>shall the king</n> הַנֶּ֔גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n> וְיִשְׂתָּעֵ֨ר <sup>8175 </sup> <n>shall come against him like a whirlwind</n> עָלָ֜יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>at him and the king</n> הַצָּפ֗וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>of the north</n> בְּרֶ֙כֶב֙ <sup>7393 </sup> <n>with chariots</n> וּבְפָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <sup>6571 </sup> <n>and with horsemen</n> וּבָאֳנִיּ֖וֹת <sup>591 </sup> <n>ships</n> רַבּ֑וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and with many</n> וּבָ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and he shall enter</n> בַאֲרָצ֖וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>into the countries</n> וְשָׁטַ֥ף <sup>7857 </sup> <n>and shall overflow</n> וְעָבָֽר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and pass over</n>
41: וּבָא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>He shall enter</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>land</n> הַצְּבִ֔י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>also into the glorious</n> וְרַבּ֖וֹת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and many</n> יִכָּשֵׁ֑לוּ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>[countries] shall be overthrown</n> וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> יִמָּלְט֣וּ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>but these shall escape</n> מִיָּד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of his hand</n> אֱד֣וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>[even] Edom</n> וּמוֹאָ֔ב <sup>4124 </sup> <n>and Moab</n> וְרֵאשִׁ֖ית <sup>7225 </sup> <n>and the chief</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> עַמּֽוֹן׃ <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n>
42: וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He shall stretch forth</n> יָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> בַּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <sup>776 </sup> <n>also upon the countries</n> וְאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִהְיֶ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will not</n> לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <sup>6413 </sup> <n>shall not escape</n>
43: וּמָשַׁ֗ל <sup>4910 </sup> <n>But he shall have power</n> בְּמִכְמַנֵּי֙ <sup>4362 </sup> <n>over the treasures</n> הַזָּהָ֣ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>of gold</n> וְהַכֶּ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and of silver</n> וּבְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֲמֻד֣וֹת <sup>2530 </sup> <n>beauty</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>things of Egypt</n> וְלֻבִ֥ים <sup>3864 </sup> <n>and the Libyans</n> וְכֻשִׁ֖ים <sup>3569 </sup> <n>and the Ethiopians</n> בְּמִצְעָדָֽיו׃ <sup>4703 </sup> <n>[shall be] at his steps</n>
44: וּשְׁמֻע֣וֹת <sup>8052 </sup> <n>But tidings</n> יְבַהֲלֻ֔הוּ <sup>926 </sup> <n>shall trouble</n> מִמִּזְרָ֖ח <sup>4217 </sup> <n>out of the east</n> וּמִצָּפ֑וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>and out of the north</n> וְיָצָא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>him therefore he shall go forth</n> בְּחֵמָ֣א <sup>2534 </sup> <n>fury</n> גְדֹלָ֔ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with great</n> לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>to destroy</n> וּֽלְהַחֲרִ֖ים <sup>2763 </sup> <n>and utterly to make away</n> רַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n>
45: וְיִטַּע֙ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>And he shall plant</n> אָהֳלֶ֣י <sup>168 </sup> <n>the tabernacles</n> אַפַּדְנ֔וֹ <sup>643 </sup> <n>of his palace</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> יַמִּ֖ים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>between the seas</n> לְהַר־ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountain</n> צְבִי־ <sup>6643 </sup> <n>in the glorious</n> קֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>holy</n> וּבָא֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>yet he shall come</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> קִצּ֔וֹ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>to his end</n> וְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and no</n> עוֹזֵ֖ר <sup>5826 </sup> <n>and none shall help</n> לֽוֹ׃
